mapper.sql: id, cts, uts, company_id, sip, agent_id, sip_pwd, status
mapper.select: select sip from cc_agent_sip where agent_id = #{agentId} and status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into cc_agent_sip (id, cts, uts, company_id, sip, agent_id, sip_pwd, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sipPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update cc_agent_sip
uts = #{uts,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sip = #{sip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sip_pwd = #{sipPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cc_agent_sip set cts = #{cts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uts = #{uts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sip = #{sip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sip_pwd = #{sipPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into cc_agent_sip (cts, company_id, agent_id , sip , sip_pwd) values
(#{sip.cts}, #{sip.companyId}, (select id from cc_agent where agent_key = #{sip.agentKey}), #{sip.sip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sip.sipPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from cc_agent_sip where company_id = #{companyId} and id = #{id} and status = 1
